{{DEFAULTSORT:Haynie, Steve}}
'''Steve Haynie''' is a comic book letterer who has worked for [[wikipedia:en:DC Comics|DC Comics]]. He was the letterer for the [[Advanced Dungeons & Dragons (comic series)|Advanced Dungeons and Dragons]] comic series, which was set in the [[Forgotten Realms]].
